amenities.name: Gym
amenities.desc: State-of-the-art fitness equipment including cardiovascular machines with personal flat screen TVs

amenities.name: Spa
amenities.desc: Rejuvenate and unwind with decadent massages, fruit scrubs and botanical bliss at our luxurious Spa. Refresh your mind body and soul with our specials on signature services bringing you wellness and relaxation for less.

amenities.name: Pool
amenities.desc: Enjoy our outdoor heated swimming pool and jacuzzi, stone fireplace and tanning deck. Relax surrounded by palm trees at our hotel pool. Enjoy poolside bites at The Joe Bar.
